Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone! I just wanted to introduce myself since I'm new to the forums. I just recently got the game and actually completed my first rendezvous in orbit yesterday after countless hours, and now you can say I am addicted.

I hope to see you guys around and hope to become a part of the community!

Hello rhuisking, and welcome to the forum!

The wonderful feeling of achievements such as your first rendezvous, your first docking, and your first Mun landing is unmatched by any other game in my experience.  I'm sure you'll enjoy your time in this fine community.

Happy landings!
Hello! ...one of us... goooood....
